plot: A fisherman's daughter fears that the family's ship 'De Bertha' will sink. Her neighbor does everything in his power to help her.
title: De Bertha
plot_es: A fisherman's daughter fears that the family's ship 'De Bertha' will sink. Her neighbor does everything in his power to help her.
plot_en: A fisherman's daughter fears that the family's ship 'De Bertha' will sink. Her neighbor does everything in his power to help her.
